text: thæcring brrda phu sraththa (thithæ cring) nan khux brrda phu sraththa tx xallxh læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh læa meux phwk khea ma rwm kan xyu kab khea (muhammad) nı kickar thi sakhay phwk khea ca mi phla xxk pi cnkwa phwk khea ca khx xnuyat cak khea(muhammad) seiy kxn thæcring brrda phu thi khx xnuyat tx cea nan khea hela nan khux brrda phu thi sraththa tx xallxh læa rx sul khxng phraxngkh dangnan meux phwk khea khx xnuyat tx cea pheux kickar bang xyang khxng phwk khea læw k cng xnuyat kæ phu thi cea phung prasngkh nı hmu phwk khea theid læa cng khx xphay tx xallxh hı kæ phwk khea thæ cring xallxh nan thrng pen phu xphay phu metta semx
